text:
An 18-year-old rape victim from a village in Junagadh district on Wednesday moved the Gujarat High Court seeking permission for undergoing abortion.

The victim claimed that she became pregnant after she was raped by a youth last year.

As the girl, who is being treated at Sola Civil Hospital here, is already having 21-weeks of pregnancy, Justice Sonia Gokani took up the matter for urgent hearing and asked the medical superintendent of the hospital to form a panel of expert doctors to examine the mental and physical condition of the girl.

The High Court has directed the medical superintendent to submit the report by February 19. — PTI
title: Rape victim seeks court permission for abortion
